resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157266</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157266</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1033</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teenage Crime</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jugendverbrechen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crime D'adolescent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crime Teenage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Crimine Teenage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφηβικό έγκλημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crimen Adolescente</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity learners will read articles about teenagers who have been caught committing a crime. They will be asked to report the crime and whether they agree with the punishment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teenage crime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">youth punishment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität lesen Anfänger Artikel 
über Jugendliche, die ein Verbrechen festlegend abgefangen worden 
sind. Sie werden gebeten, über das Verbrechen zu berichten und 
ob sie mit der Bestrafung einverstandenSIND.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants liront des 
articles concernant les adolescents qui ont été attrapés commettant
un crime. Ils seront invités à enregistrer le crime et s'ils 
sont d'accord avec la punition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners lerão artigos sobre 
os teenagers que foram travados que cometem um crime. Serão 
pedidos para relatar o crime e se concordam com a punição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività principianti leggeranno gli 
articoli sugli adolescenti che sono stati interferiti che commettono 
un crimine. Saranno chiesti di segnalare il crimine e se 
accosentono con la punizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα διαβάσουν τα
άρθρα για τους εφήβους που έχουν πιαστεί ένα έγκλημα. Θα 
κληθούν να εκθέσουν το έγκλημα και εάν συμφωνούν με την τιμωρία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad los principiantes leerán los 
artículos acerca de los adolescentes que se han cogido que confiaban 
un crimen. Les pedirán señalar el crimen y si convienen con el
castigo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jugendverbrechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jugendbestrafung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">crime d'adolescent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">punition de la jeunesse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crime teenage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">punição da juventude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">crimine teenage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">punizione della gioventù</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εφηβικό έγκλημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τιμωρία νεολαίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">crimen adolescente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">castigo de la juventud</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
